html.label: Intro
html.p:
Hello and welcome to our survey!
Thank you in advance for your participation.  This study is very important to us and we ask that you answer each question carefully and completely.
While going through the survey, please use the scroll bar on the right and bottom of your screen to move up and down through questions and images.  Please remember that there are no right or wrong answers.  We are only interested in your opinions.
Thank you again!  Let’s begin…

block.label: AgreementBlock
block.note: THIS QUESTION SHOULD BE LEFT IN TO ENSURE QUALITY OF INTERVIEWING AND THAT IT'S NOT A BOT TAKING THE SURVEY

title.p:
During this survey you will be asked questions with detailed instructions and it is important that you read them closely and answer honestly so we may understand you better.
This question is a test to see how well you’re able to read the question text and
instructions.
From the list below, please select only "[pipe: Red_Herring_Activity_TRAP]" and do not select any other responses.

radio.label: RedHerringCheck
radio.title: Which of the following is not a color?

div.ul:
Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve Confidential Information and you must agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, you will not be eligible to participate in this study. By signing this agreement, you agree as follows:
You will use information or material disclosed to you or which may be available as part of this study only for the purpose of participating in this study, and you will not otherwise use the information or material for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
You agree to keep confidential and not disclose, copy, transmit, or use for any purpose other than your participation in this study any information or material disclosed or made available to you as part of the study, including about products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this study. Any disclosure, copying, transmitting or misuse of any information or material in any form (including hard copy and/or electronic/data) whether intentional or unintentional may subject you to disqualification, and any other remedies available to Behaviorally or its study partners in law or equity.
You agree that Behaviorally (and its partners) will be irreparably harmed and monetary damages may not be adequate compensation if you fail to meet your obligations under this agreement, and that, in addition to other remedies, Behaviorally (or its partners) shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief to prevent any threatened or continued breach. The parties hereby waive any requirements for security for obtaining any provisional relief.
Each of Behaviorally’s partners is an intended third-party beneficiary of this agreement and each partner may enforce the terms of this agreement.

title.p:
As further detailed in our privacy policy (https://www.behaviorally.com/privacy-policy), we take reasonable precautions to protect the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey. All information collected as part of this survey is treated in accordance with our online privacy policy and is destroyed 2 months after you have taken this survey. You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

block.label: RealEyeExercise
block.builder:title: Real Eye Exercise
block.html:
Hi! Your privacy and comfort are important to us!
You will be asked to turn on your webcam on the next page.
Your face and your background will not be recorded.
Just so you know - only the green dot area is being looked at for movement as you engage with our content.
[pipe:GREENDOTS]
block.note: Programmer NOTE: THIS RE_AreementBlock is for studies in Europe Only and is set FALSE for all other countries

block.label: RE_AgreementBlock
block.cond: Country.FR or Country.UK or Country.DE or Country.IT or Country.ES or Country.PL or Country.NL or Country.CH or Country.AT or Country.DK

div.ul:
At one point in the study, you will see images and we would like to use your computer’s webcam to provide data that will allow us to analyze the movement of your eyes and their movement relative to the images you are being shown.
Please know - We never store any images or videos from your webcam. By analyzing eye behavior, our client Behaviorally can understand more about how people react to various images.
These data points will be analyzed by computer, and final data output will be mixed with those of other people who take part in this study.
With your permission, researchers from Behaviorally may view the gaze prediction data to check everything is working correctly. The technology used is provided by our trusted partner RealEye. All data is processed and kept securely in accordance with the RealEye Privacy Policy (https://www.realeye.io/about/privacy/).

title.p: By consenting, you agree to share the data points reference above. This data will only be used for market research and analysis purposes associated with this Project and will not be shared in any public domain.

row.label: r1
row.b: Yes, I agree and consent to participate

row.label: r2
row.b: No, I do not agree, and I understand that the survey will end at this time

block.label: EyeFlowShelf
block.html:
Shelf View Exercise Explanation:
A blurred shelf of the test category is shown to shoppers. Respondents are asked to mouse over the image and un-blur the products that first catch their attention so they can see the products of interest more clearly. The heatmaps and data generated from this exercise will indicate how much attention each product or brand was able to generate.

html.label: Maximize
html.strong:
Throughout this survey, you are going to be shown several pictures. Please be sure that you maximize your window at this time, such that you can see these pictures with as much clarity as possible. You can also mouse over the images to see them magnified at any time.
Press F11 for full screen.

block.html:
Assume you are doing your shopping from the category shown on your screen.
On this shopping trip, you can navigate the shelf and un-blur products which catch your attention.
To start the navigation, please click on the 1st product that attracts you. You can then continue to navigate the shelf by un-blurring further products of interest. Please scroll to see the whole shelf.
When finished with the exercise, all you need to do is click on the image one more time. If you are ready, please click on the “next” button.
Remember to click/touch the image to start the exercise. Please scroll to see the whole shelf.

textarea.label: EF_Shelf_Practice

block.html: Here is another image. Remember to click/touch the image to start the exercise. Please scroll to see the whole shelf.

textarea.label: E_Flow_Ex_Shelf1

block.note: For 2.5Dv2 SHELF: STEP 1. remove cond = "False" at "25D_Shopping" to allow for 2.5D Shopping. RealEye should be right above this.
STEP 2. "HideDecipherShop" block: Leave "cond = "False" to hide Decipher Shopping.
STEP 3. Move both close blocks after vproductsbought.

block.label: 25D_Shopping
block.html:
Please go shopping for [pipe: Category lower]. Select the products that you wish to purchase by clicking on the individual products on the shelf.  You may purchase as many or as few products as you like. 
Please be patient as it may take a moment to load the shelf.
To see a close-up of a product, use your mouse roller to zoom in.
To purchase a product, click on the product, click the arrow buttons to add quantity and click "Add to Cart"
To change your mind about purchasing a product, click on the "put back" button or click on the shopping cart to remove products.
When finished with the shopping trip, click the "check out" button on the bottom of your screen.
Please be sure to view the entire shelf before proceeding.
Redirect to shopping questions

logic.label: api_buzz_shop1
logic.title: API Integration for Buzz Data from Dropbox

block.exec:
if api_buzz_shop1.status == 200: data_shop1 = api_buzz_shop1.r.get('data') if data_shop1:
question_shop1 = data_shop1['question'] row_arr_shop1 = data_shop1['row'] quantity_arr_shop1 = data_shop1['quantity'] order_arr_shop1 = data_shop1['order'] time_arr_shop1 = data_shop1['time']
if 'vFindTimeSeconds' in data_shop1: vFindTimeSeconds.val = data_shop1['vFindTimeSeconds']
for i in range(len(row_arr_shop1)): eval(question_shop1 + ".c1." + row_arr_shop1[i]).val = quantity_arr_shop1[i] eval(question_shop1 + ".c2." + row_arr_shop1[i]).val = order_arr_shop1[i] eval(question_shop1 + ".c3." + row_arr_shop1[i]).val = time_arr_shop1[i]

block.note: 2.5D STEP 2 HERE: "HideDecipherShop" block: Leave "cond = "False" to hide Decipher Shopping.
2.5D STEP 3 HERE: Move both close blocks after vproducts purchased.

block.note: PUT THIS BLOCK AROUND Decipher SHOPPING AND VIRTUALS when there is 2.5Dv2 shopping

block.html:
Shelf Exercise Explanation:
In this exercise shoppers are asked to shop the test category as if they would actually be in their usual store, doing their purchases. For this, the category shelf is shown to shoppers again and respondents can zoom in on the shelf to see the products in greater detail. Shoppers can also click on individual products to enlarge them and either purchase them or put them back on shelf.

number.label: P_QuantityPurchased
number.title:
Please go shopping for [pipe: Category lower]. Select the products that you wish to purchase by clicking on the individual products on the shelf. You may purchase as many or as few as you like.
Please be patient as it may take a moment to load the shelf.

div.ul:
If you would like to see a close-up of a product, hover your mouse over the product.
If you would like to purchase a product, click on the product and use the "+/-" buttons to add quantity and click "Purchase"
To change your mind about purchasing a product, click the "put back" button or click on the shopping cart to remove products.
When finished, click the "continue" button on the bottom of your screen.
Please be sure to view the entire shelf before proceeding. You may need to scroll over/down to do so.

block.label: IAT
block.builder:title: Immediate Association Test
block.html:
The Immediate Association Test Explained:
In the immediate association test we want to find out whether the designs quickly and intuitively convey key attributes within a competitive context. For this, respondents are shown the test product and two key competitors. For each statement or attribute, respondents are given 6 seconds (maximum) to choose which product / brand best applies to the statement.

html.span:
You are now going to see another series of statements and products on your screen.
Please pay attention as it's going to be very quick.
As soon as a statement appears you will have 5 seconds to click on the product that best fits with the statement.
Ready? Please continue.

html.label: EF_Pack_Intro

We are going to take you on a visual trip through a store.
On your trip, you will see a series of individual products which you may find in a store.
Look at each product as if considering for purchase.
To start the exercise, using the mouse, click once on the 1st element that attracts you to un-blur that section and then continue your pack observation. Please scroll to see the whole pack. 
When finished with the scene, all you need to do is click on the image one more time.

radio.label: S_Recontact_Will
radio.title:
You are eligible to participate in a follow-up online market research discussion on consumer products. This is not an attempt to sell you anything -- this is strictly a research study. This is also an opportunity to express your thoughts, opinions and ideas to a company that is interested in what you have to say.
The 15 to 20 minute discussion would take place over a live online video call with a certified moderator, and would require you to use a laptop or desktop computer (not a mobile device or tablet). You will receive an additional incentive of [pipe: QualPrice] for participating in this discussion.
If selected, you will be notified within 1 week, at which point you will receive details regarding when the discussion will take place. Would you be willing to participate?

radio.label: S_Recontact_CAM
radio.title: Does your laptop or desktop computer have a functioning web cam?

radio.label: S_Recontact_SPEED
radio.title: Please select the response that best describes your internet connection.
radio.row: High-Performance Internet (any service faster than standard Cable)

text.title: Please provide your contact information so that we may contact you if selected.

html.strong:
Thank you for this information!
Thank you for participation! You have been determined eligible for the online discussion mentioned earlier. If selected, we will contact you within 1 week, at which point you will receive details regarding when the discussion will take place.

radio.comment: Using a scale of 1 to 5, where one means “does not describe me at all” and 5 means “describes you extremely well,” tell me how well each statement describes you personally.
radio.row: When I meet people for the first time, I'm shy and do not talk much
I enjoy talking with others and expressing my opinion
I am open about expressing my thoughts
I usually listen to what others say and don't talk too much myself

radio.label: Q_Willing
radio.title:
Thank you for taking this portion of our survey. Your efforts are greatly appreciated!
You have been selected to participate in a 10-minute video discussion on consumer products. This is not an attempt to sell you anything - this is strictly to collect your opinion. This conversation will be recorded for training purposes.
You will receive an extra incentive of $25 for participating in this discussion.
If you would like to participate you need to be available for 10 minutes right after clicking yes below.
Would you be willing to participate?
radio.comment: Click on a button to select.

radio.row: High-performance internet (any service faster than standard Cable)

row.label: r2
row.autofill: (Q_Willing.r2 or S_Recontact_Cam.r2 or S_Recontact_Speed.r1) or (DescribeMeCheck.r2) or (ArticulationCheck.r2)

autofill.label: QualityRespondent
autofill.title: Eligible, said yes, and passed the quality check
autofill.row: Qualified for In the Moment Qual
